metadata.title: CVE-2024-34088 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1, it is possible for the get_edge() functionin ospf_te.c in the OSPF daemon to return a NULL pointer. In cases wherecalling functions do not handle the returned NULL value, the OSPF daemoncrashes, leading to denial of service.

criterions.comment: frr package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
